sceneCode: 테스트를 위해 일부분의 텍스트만 추출. 텍스트 전부 추출해도 정상작동함.

orig: Hm... I just know it. Tiamat's above us in the sky.
The sky... I can't believe we've come this far just to hit a dead end.
No, there's still a way. Everyone, board the Grandcypher!
Oh no... She's practically lost her senses! I can't believe she was pushed this far.

Whew!
Not bad. Not bad at all...
Everything's going to be all right. I absorbed Tiamat's overflowing energy.
She should return to her senses now.
